mapper.sql: ID, MEMBER_ID, NAME, COVER, PRICE, INPUT_TIME, INPUT_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER
mapper.select: SELECT n.ID, n.MEMBER_ID, n.NAME, n.COVER, n.PRICE, n.INPUT_TIME, n.INPUT_USER, n.UPDATE_TIME, n.UPDATE_USER, m.NAME AS memberName FROM product n LEFT JOIN member m ON n.MEMBER_ID = m.ID
mapper.insert: insert into product (ID, MEMBER_ID, NAME, COVER, PRICE, INPUT_TIME, INPUT_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, INTRODUCTION) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inputUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into product
ID,
MEMBER_ID,
NAME,
COVER,
PRICE,
INPUT_TIME,
INPUT_USER,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATE_USER,
INTRODUCTION,

mapper.update:
update product
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COVER = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_TIME = #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INPUT_USER = #{inputUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTRODUCTION = #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
